name: Samhain Night
description:
Inspired by Lovecraft, Samhein Night is hybrid of Nuclear Throne and Bloodborne. 

This game takes You to world infested by cosmic horror.  

Demo version contains two levels with uniqe Bosses at the end of each.

CONTROLS:

W,S,A,D - move

Left Mouse Button - shot

Right Mouse Button - use character special ability

Q - heal (uses collected points)

E - interact witch objects

Space - switch spell

P.S.:

Tell me if You beat this demo
